casebody.data:
Diana DERUISE-PIERCE, Surviving Spouse of Roy T. Pierce
v.
UNIVERSITY HEALTHCARE SYSTEM, L.C. d/b/a Tubane University Hospital and Clinic, University Medical Center Management Corporation d/b/a/ University Medical Center New Orleans, Davis Wendell Ogitani, M.D., Brian Conkerton, R.N. and Danielle Williams-Johnson, R.N. NO. 2018-C-1886 Supreme Court of Louisiana. January 28, 2019 Denied. WEIMER, J., would grant.
